short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with LyveBee users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empowering individuals to help others in need by enabling them to share their knowledge, passions, hobbies and life experiences. A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with LyveBee users.
